description: This file defines API routes related to user dashboard information, including a GET endpoint '/me' that returns the current user's profile and features based on their package tier.

classes.name: DashboardResponse
classes.description: Response model containing user profile and feature list.

classes.name: DashboardFeature
classes.description: Model representing individual features available on the dashboard.

classes.name: UserPublic
classes.description: Model representing public user profile information.

classes.name: PackageTier
classes.description: Enum representing different tiers of user packages.

methods.name: list[DashboardFeature] _features_for(tier: PackageTier)
methods.description: Private function that returns a list of features enabled for a given package tier.

methods.name: DashboardResponse me(user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: API route handler returning dashboard info for the current user.
